name: Great British Heritage Pocket Notebook - The Meadows
description:
Superior quality materials and British bookbinding craftsmanship makes a notebook bu NOTARY special, it stands apart from the crowd.

With beautiful yet functional designs that have been inspired by centuries of bookbinding; it’s an object to capture thoughts, treasure memories and organise lives.

A little bit of designer luxury, brought to you at a price where you can afford to treat yourself and gift to others.

DESCRIPTION
This pocket notebook with ruled pages fits comfortably in any pocket or handbag. Hand bound using traditional methods, the book has a flexible yet sturdy cover.

With elastic closure, expandable pocket and our signature Notary ribbon page marker, it is the perfect notebook for capturing thoughts.

DETAILS
Ruled Pocket Notebook £15
Size: 9 x 14 cm
No. of pages: 180
Paper: Ivory smooth, 100gsm fountain pen friendly. Ruled.
Cover: 100% cotton book cloth

As all of our notebooks are hand made using traditional methods, our delivery time is between 10-14 days. Please bear this in mind when ordering.

name: Great British Heritage Pocket Notebook - Hand bound in Stamford, England
description:
Superior quality materials and British bookbinding craftsmanship makes a notebook bu NOTARY special, it stands apart from the crowd.

With beautiful yet functional designs that have been inspired by centuries of bookbinding; it’s an object to capture thoughts, treasure memories and organise lives.

A little bit of designer luxury, brought to you at a price where you can afford to treat yourself and gift to others.

DESCRIPTION
This pocket notebook with ruled pages fits comfortably in any pocket or handbag. Hand bound using traditional methods, the book has a flexible yet sturdy cover.

With elastic closure, expandable pocket and our signature Notary ribbon page marker, it is the perfect notebook for capturing thoughts.

DETAILS
Ruled Pocket Notebook £15
Size: 9 x 14 cm
No. of pages: 180
Paper: Ivory smooth, 100gsm fountain pen friendly. Ruled.
Cover: 100% cotton book cloth
Available in: 4 colours

PERSONALISATION
For a bespoke gift or if you have a specific use in mind, all NOTARY notebooks can be personalised with initials, dates, events or holiday destinations.

As all of our notebooks are hand made using traditional methods, our delivery time is between 10-14 days. Please bear this in mind when ordering.

Prices start at £5.00 to add initials, and £10.00 for other messages. Please email us at Email@NotebooksByNotary.co.uk to add this to your order.
